subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*g/m/b-raŋ||strong; firm; tense}} or {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*(d/t)aŋ||tense; tight}}; compare {{cog|bo|ཐང་པོ||tense; tight; firm}}, {{cog|my|တင်||to tighten; to be tight}}.

Pronunciation 2 is the exopassive of pronunciation 1, literally “to be stretched” ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
